people who are financially dependent on the state
依靠国家救济的人
a state-owned company
国营公司
They wish to limit the power of the State.
他们希望限制政府权力。
The president was driven in state through the streets.
总统乘车隆重地从街上穿过。
I've never been to the States.
我从未去过美国。
She was in a real state about her exams.
她对考试感到很紧张。
What a state this place is in!
这地方真够乱的！
She was in a real state about her exams.
她对考试感到很紧张。
What a state this place is in!
这地方真够乱的！
This state of affairs can no longer be ignored.
再不能无视这种情况了。
This state of affairs can no longer be ignored.
再不能无视这种情况了。
What is the current state of play in the peace talks?
和平谈判目前进展得怎么样？
What is the current state of play in the peace talks?
和平谈判目前进展得怎么样？
state education
公办教育
families dependent on state benefits(= in Britain, money given by the government to people who are poor)
靠政府救济金生活的家庭
state secrets(= information that could be harmful to a country if it were discovered by an enemy)
国家机密
The Queen is on a state visit to Moscow.
女王正对莫斯科进行国事访问。
the state opening of Parliament
隆重的议会开幕式
the state apartments(= used for official ceremonies)
国事活动厅
a state prison/hospital/university, etc.
州监狱、州立医院、州立大学等
state police/troopers
州警察
a state tax
州税
He has already stated his intention to run for election.
他已声明打算参加竞选。
The facts are clearly stated in the report.
报道对事实真相作了清楚的说明。
There is no need to state the obvious(= to say sth that everyone already knows) .
显而易见的事实就不必陈述了。
State clearly how many tickets you require.
说清楚你需要多少张票。
He stated categorically that he knew nothing about the deal.
他明确表示对那笔交易一无所知。
It was stated that standards at the hospital were dropping.
据称，那家医院的医疗水准在不断下降。
The contract was stated to be invalid.
那份合同宣布作废。
This is not one of their stated aims.
在他们宣布的目标里没有这一条。
You must arrive at the time stated.
你必须在规定时间到达。
Do not exceed the stated dose(= of medicine) .
不要超过规定的剂量。

ex: n. 地址；住址；演说；称呼
v. 演说；处理；演讲；对付
网络 通讯地址；联系地址；公司地址
eg2: What's your name and address ?
你的姓名、住址？
I'll give you my address and phone number.
我会告诉你我的地址和电话号码。
Is that your home address ?
这是你的住址吗？
Please note my change of address .
请注意我的地址变了。
Police found him at an address(= a house or flat/apartment) in West London.
警方在伦敦西区一处住所里找到了他。
people of no fixed address(= with no permanent home)
没有固定居所的人
What's your email address ?
你的电邮地址是什么？
The project has a new website address .
这个项目有个新的网址。
tonight's televised presidential address
今晚总统的电视演讲
The letter was correctly addressed, but delivered to the wrong house.
信上的姓名地址写得都对，但被错投到另一家去了。
Address your application to the Personnel Manager.
把你的申请信寄给人事经理。
to address a meeting
在会议上发表演讲
I was surprised when he addressed me in English.
他用英语跟我说话，我很诧异。
Any questions should be addressed to your teacher.
任何问题都应该向你的老师求教。
The judge should be addressed as ‘Your Honour’.
对法官应该称“法官大人”。
Your essay does not address the real issues.
你的论文没有论证实质问题。
We must address ourselves to the problem of traffic pollution.
我们必须设法解决交通污染问题。

ex: vt. 要求；需要；查询
vi. 需要；请求；查问
n. [经] 需求；要求；需要
n. (Demand)人名；(德)德曼德

wp.demand function: 需求函数;需求作用;需求函數
wp.demand expansion: 需求膨胀;需求扩张;扩大需求
wp.demand forecasting: 需求预测;请求预报;需要预测;需求猜测
wp.aggregate demand: 总需求;		总需求量;总合需求;政府开支
wp.tax demand: 催税单;催税双;		核定税款
wp.potential demand: 潜在需求;潜在需要;估计需求;潜在的需求
wp.consumer demand: 消费者需求;		消费需求;消费者;消费者的要求
wp.derived demand: 派生需求;		衍生需求;		引致需求;引申需求

eg2: for a product usually determines supply.
一种产品的需求往往影响供应。
In production， we demand not only quantity but also quality.
我们的产品不但要求数量多， 而且要求质量高。
The management reacted to the  of workers by increasing their wages since April.
资方对工人的要求作出反应，答应从四月份起增加工资。

ex: n. 藏匿处；藏匿物
vt. 存放；贮藏
vi. 存放；藏起来
eg2: To slow the spoiling process,  them in the refrigerator immediately.
为减缓它们的腐败过程，应立即将它们放入雪柜贮藏起来。
I'm taking you in for questioning. We've uncovered a stash of bootleg liquor and I think you know something about it.
我要带你回去问话。我们已经发现了一个违法烈性酒的藏匿处，我想你可能知道关于它的一些情况。
Solution:  single-serving packages of nuts and dried fruit in your desk and plan to munch a few hours after lunch--when you feel moderate hunger.
解决方法：存放一个专用于装果仁和水果干的袋子在你的桌子里，当吃完午餐几小时之后你感到饥饿时拿出来嚼。

ex: 网络 精氨酸；铝；名媛大尺度写真

content: Most bank won’t touch America’ legal pot industry IT IS often said that market hate uncertainty. America’ marijuana industry i no exception. Earli thi year Jeff Sessions, the country’ attorney-general, rescind a set of federal guidelin for marijuana-relat business operat in stat where the drug i legal. Now lawmaker and business in these stat are demand clarity for an industry that could generate a much a $11bn in revenue in 2018. The financial-servic industry may be one of the larg beneficiar of great certainty. Provid bank servic to pot-selle i a risky endeavour. Despite be legal in one form or anoth in 29 states, marijuana i bann und the federal Controll Substanc Act, and classif a a so-call Schedule 1 drug alongside cocaine and heroin. Thi i why the vast majority of American bank refuse to do busine with the industry, l they run foul of federal statut on money-laundering, drug-traffick and racketeering. A of Septemb 2017, just 400 of America’ 5,700 bank cate to the sector (see chart). Without acce to financial services, most marijuana-relat business operate on a cash-on basis, stash pil of money in duffel bag and hir arm guard to protect employe from robberies. The Obama administration tr to addre the issue in 2013 when the Department of Justice laid out it priorit for prosecut marijuana-relat crimes, which includ prevent marijuana sal to minor and the traffick of the drug acros state lines. The follow year, the Treasury hint to bank serv the cannabi industry that they would not be charg if they close monitor their client and fil “suspicious-activity reports” document relevant transactions. But in January Mr Session rescind hi predecessor’ pot-friend policies. The move wa not a surprise. In a Senate hear in 2016, Session famous said that “good people don’t smoke marijuana”. Stat eag to stimulate their marijuana markets–and the tax revenu that they generate–may take matte into their own hands. California and Massachusett are consider creat public bank for pot-sellers. And on Capitol Hill, Senator Cory Gardn of Colorado, a Republican, recent announc that the White House ha express support for legislation allow stat to regulate marijuana. On April 20th Charl Schumer, the Democratic lead in the Senate, i expect to unveil just such a bill.
title: Most banks won’t touch America’s legal pot industry
